A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have to counteract the haters and say that I really LIKED this movie. Not perfect by any means (there were plenty of things I didn't care for)\, but it is much better than Force Awakens. A lot of people\, including avid fans\, will dismiss this movie because it actually challenges expectations and forces you to THINK. Do yourself a favor and don't join the knee jerk reactions you see on social media.
